revision.text:
{{Infobox Peripheral NOS |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = ubld.it |model = TrueRNG |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/30/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubld.it TrueRNG v2 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = <!-- Wireless class --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |if_connector_type = Male A |form_factor = dongle
|vendor_id = 04d8 |device_id = f5fe |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addl_chips = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = random number generator
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |manuf_country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [https://www.tindie.com/products/ubldit/truerng-v2/ On Tindie] (retired)
The TrueRNG v2 was superseded by the [[ubld.it TrueRNG v3]], as, [http://ubld.it/truerng_v3 per ubld.it], the v2 had 'very minor bias'.
{{lowercase}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
